rule.name: ims-workflow-change
rule.title: IMSv4: notify on workflow state change
rule.description: this rule sends and email when an indicator changes workflow status

action.property:
Dear IMS user,
The following indicator ${title} ${url} has been sent by the author ${user_fullname} for HoG review and approval.
The HoG currently setup in the indicator is ${taxonomy_hog_users}. If this is not correct, please do both the following steps:
- forward this email to the correct HoG for feedback and approval - edit the indicator metadata : right hand panel > Document > Workflow > "Content responsible Head of Group" make sure this field contains correct HoG.
*Instructions*: If needed, modify the indicator together with its author. Once finished please submit the indicator for consultation. Make sure the consultation emails are entered in the appropriate indicator metadata section.
You should complete this step *within 10 working days* (2 weeks) from the date of receipt of this mail.
if you think you are not the right person to review the indicator or have any other questions, please contact the indicator workflow manager Andy Martin.
Best ------ IMSv4 This is an auto-generated email. Please do not reply to it. For any questions please contact andy.martin@eea.europa.eu.

rule.name: ims-workflow-invite-for
rule.title: IMSv4: invite for consultation
rule.description: open indicator for comments and sends invitation email for consultation

action.property:
Dear colleague,
You have been invited by ${user_fullname} (${user_email}) to provide feedback on the following indicator ${title} ${url}
Instructions: Login with your Eionet credentials and add your comments below the indicator. The EEA indicator author will reply to your feedback asap.
Please: Do not reply to this auto-generated email. Comments must be added via the online consultation tool.
If you don't have an Eionet account, please contact the indicator author ${creator_email} in order to have it set-up.
Please complete this step within 5 working days.
Best ------ ${user_fullname} European Environment Agency

rule.name: ims-workflow-submit-qc
rule.title: IMSv4: Submit to QC team - figures
rule.description: notify indicators QC team to start figures finalisation.

action.property:
The following indicator ${title} ${url} has been submitted for your finalisation of figures and text.
Instructions: login and finalise the figures, text and their metadata.
You have 10 working days to do this task. You will not receive any further automatic reminders.
For figures only, once you are done, change the state to "Figures finalised". This will submit an email to the other QC team members to finalise their part (copy editing and overall data and metadata check).
[IMSv4] Indicator's text and figures to be finalised

rule.name: ims-workflow-notify-qc
rule.title: IMSv4: notify on QC of data and metadata done
rule.description: sends email notification when data and metadata QC is completed

action.property:
The following indicator ${title} ${url} has gone through data and metadata QC.
Instructions: login and finalise copyediting. You should complete this step within 5 days. No more reminders will be sent. when done you may submit for publication.

rule.name: ims-workflow-notify-figures
rule.title: IMSv4: Notify on figures finalised
rule.description: Send a notification to Editor and Data and metadata QC .

action.property:
Figures in the following indicator ${title} ${url} have been finalised.
You can access the workflow log at ${url}/history
Instructions: login and start finalising copyediting. You should complete this step within 5 days. NOTE: Please do not submit for publishing yet. You need to receive the notification about "Data and metadata QC is done".
